text: Balthazar Johannes Vorster was a Dutch politician. He served as the Prime Minister of South Africa and State President of South Africa. He is commonly known as John Vorster. Vorster believed in apartheid. He was part of a group who sentenced Nelson Mandela to life imprisonment. ==References== Category:1915 births Category:1983 deaths Category:Afrikaner people Category:Calvinists Category:State Presidents of South Africa Category:Prime Ministers of South Africa Category:People associated with Apartheid
title: B. J. Vorster
